long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PrimeVault's extension enables registered users of PrimeVault (https://www.primevault.com/) to seamlessly connect with DApps (Web3 Apps) using the open-source WalletConnect library. 
Extension serves as a bridge between PrimeVault's web app and various DApps, enabling users to initiate actions on DApps web pages and then review or approve them within the PrimeVault web interface.
